channel.title: Working Mom on Wendy's Hacker Mom Space
channel.description: Recent content in Working Mom on Wendy's Hacker Mom Space

item.title: How to not quit your job after maternity leave
item.description: Disclaimer: I am extremely fortunate to have a well paying job, very helpful social circle of mom friends, and super supportive employer to empower me to explore what I like to do in my career. I wanted to note down my journey to let others prepare for this transition in case things don’t line up like this. My own transition Lately, I have transitioned into a different role at work (within the same company) and couldn’t be happier!
